Text:
News From The Front and Markovian Process are only on the B-Sides Collection, not on Strager Than Fiction.
Please seed when done downloading.
Also, Yesterday and Frogger is not on Bad Religion. Dunno what went wrong when I wrote the description...
Would love some feedback so I know if this is good enough :)
Oh yeah. Thx dude!
kickass, thanks alot!
very nice man, thanks!!
Fucking awesome man, thanks.
missing "All Ages" but that's kind of a best of album, so maybe it doesn't reaaaaally count. thanks much though, awesome torrent!

"No complications included. All songs can be found in the ?proper? albums anyways."

Hence All Ages is missing ;)
Once it hits the 75% mark, it moves a little slower, but it's still working toward 100 and doing fine...

Their most recent album, New Maps of Hell, is not included in this discography.
You can find it in proper quality (ripped by me) here: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3739079
Ripped in LAME APX, also known as V0, the highest VBR quality available to mp3

Great torrent! They're all catagorized very nicely, and the album art goes into iTunes automatically!
It didn't take long at all to DL.
Thanks a lot!

Would people be interested in an upgraded version of this torrent?

I'm thinking of re-ripping all albums in better quality (except b-sides of course), and adding New Maps of Hell.
What do you think? Worth the trouble?
I would download that torrent if you post it.
